attributes.action: Conditions to Privatisation of Royal Mail : Images and branding
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that, in the event of the privatisation of the Royal Mail:

1. It should no longer be permitted  to use the word "Royal" in its name for the purposes of trading.

2. It should no longer be allowed to use the image or any other likeness of the monarch on postage stamps, or any other materials relating to the marketing or branding of the organisation.
